explanation: Hourglass, Sundial, Clock, and Calendar are all tools or systems used to measure or track time. A Compass is an instrument used to determine geographic direction.

The Declaration of Independence, U.S. Constitution, Bill of Rights, and Emancipation Proclamation are all seminal historical documents of the United States. The Magna Carta is a foundational document in English law, originating in England.

DECADE (10 years), CENTURY (100 years), MILLENNIUM (1000 years), and SCORE (20 years) all refer to specific, defined durations of time. EPOCH refers to a notable period of time, but not a fixed, quantifiable length.
